sub_title: Hue Software Developer - SAFe® 4 DevOps Practitioner @ Philips Hue
summary:
Graduate Software Engineer in Test working with Java, python, linux, groovy, C#, databases, rest and docker.

7 years working with testing software. 2 years working with Selenium Webdriver and 5 years working with API testing for Functional and Non-Functional requirements using Docker, Django, Python, Git, Maven, Unit Test, Cucumber, Spring and Java development. Experienced with continuous integration and Continuous delivery using Jenkins and Bamboo. Agile/Scrum development with Safe Methodologies using Rally and Jira.

Constantly seeking new challenges and to acquire new knowledge in the area. Used to work with smaller and larger teams. Very comfortable working with multicultural teams.

treasury_media.title: ISTQB Certified Tester Advanced Level, Technical Test Analyst
Certified SAFe® 4 DevOps Practitioner was issued by Scaled Agile Inc to Leonardo Kochake Gomes.
treasury_media.description: A Certified SAFe 4 DevOps Practitioner (SDP) is a SAFe professional responsible for improving the complete flow of value through a Continuous Delivery Pipeline from idea to operational solution. Key areas of responsibility include participating in...

school.name: Education and Computer Society of Parana

awards.title: Exceed Expectations - 2020
awards.description: Despite the difficulties imposed by Covid19 and the resulting work-from-home measures, you were highly productive and delivered your valuable contributions in System testing and beyond. You also found new inspiration and motivation by broadening your scope to Bridge integration activities and maintaining the CI/CD pipeline. Keep learning where the world around us is changing rapidly. Thanks for your contribution helping rendering the Hue Connected business very successful over the past year.
awards.issuer: Paul Krekel - R&D Home Systems & Luminaries - Hue Infrastructure Team

awards.title: Exceed Expectations - 2019
awards.description:
Great personal growth and good business output by delivering a super System-level test automation
framework, accessible to all product teams to execute System-level product tests.
awards.issuer: Paul Krekel - R&D Home Systems & Luminaries - System Quality Integration and Validation

awards.title: Made it Happen - Our Mission - 2017
awards.description: Thank you for the hard work for Reporting 2.0. you stepped in for Rahul and have done an amazing job. Especially considering the number of environments and frequency of releases. Reporting 2.0 monthly releases wouldn't have been possible without your hard work.

awards.title: High Five Award - 2015
awards.description: Recognition for championing the initiative to automate integration test coverage and promoting quality code development practices.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for pipeline creation, expansion and maintenance.
Release and Patch creation.
Automate release notes.
Integrate pipelines from multiple teams.
Reduce integration time from 2 hours to 45 minutes
Artifacts management.
Dockorize environments.
Bash scripting.
Improve pipeline notifications for development and infrastructure.
Automate infrastructure software updates
Support software development team of ~40 developers.
Manage infrastructure and test as service
Kubernetes orchestration 
AWS cluster
Gitlab CI/CD  Management
profile_positions.title: Hue Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for testing integration and validation with automated software for the HUE products.
Using mainly Java, maven, groovy, Jenkins, artifactory and sonar. 
Responsible for creating and maintaining Jenkins pipeline scripts for CI/CD strategy.
Fully automate deployments, update of test setups, commit stage with a multi-branch pipeline.
Creation of test frameworks.
Responsible for maintaining the infrastructure of the test setups and expansion.
Responsible for maintaining/expanding Jenkins with automatic updates, new plugins, new Jenkins Pipeline scripts and Docker support for running jobs as dynamic slaves.

Act as Scrum Master for a team size of 8 people.
profile_positions.title: Hue System Test Automation Engineer & Scrum Master

profile_positions.description: Due to the excellent work done in the Reporting Mastercard project. I was recognized and started to perform this new role. Responsible for 2 projects: Smart Data Real Time Account and ADA - American with Disabilities Act. I gave training to new test engineers of how to use the best standards of automation, inside Mastercard framework. Experience of work with Continuous Integration as Bamboo and Jenkins. Configured the first Jenkins plan with Jenkins Enterprise using pipeline and groovy script.
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer in Test

profile_positions.description: Developer of automated testing using Java,  JBehave, Selenium Webdriver, Maven and Git. I was responsible for testing execution, acceptance test writing and validation, scrum daily meetings and story pointing. Increased the integration coverage of Smart Data Manage from 0% to 60%. Joined Reporting 2.0 project. My goal was to restructure the automation project, that had only 4 stories and almost all steps did many things in a single method. After some time of dedication, I managed to restructure the project, delivering 48 stories.
profile_positions.title: Testing Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Developer of automated testing using JBehave and Selenium. Also I´m responsible for testing execution, acceptance test writing and validation, scrum daily meetings and story pointing. I have experience on working on multicultural team, at the moment our team are located in Brazil, St Louis, Dublin and Malaysia.

Experience of work with Continuous Integration as Bamboo and Jenkins. Configured the first Jenkins plan with Jenkins Enterprise using pipeline and groovy script.
profile_positions.title: System Analyst

profile_positions.description: Creating test scenarios as test plans, test cases, Defect Reports and Custom Reports using HP Quality Center (Application Lifecycle Management).  Ensuring progress reporting requirements are met, providing feedback to the development team and providing estimates to senior managers. Manage the prioritization and reporting of defects. Experience with Retail, Financial, Telecom and Customer Management. Developed automation solution for applications and procedures my team.
profile_positions.title: Test Analyst

profile_positions.description: Elaboration of plans, cases and test scripts. Testing in projects and maintenance of software, authentication and migrations. Experience in tests in the homologation environment. Elaboration of weekly accompaniments. Knowledge in application software testing with Delphi, PHP, C # Web and Web-services. When necessary I elaborate changes in the structure to guarantee the success of the project, always accompany by Project Manager.
profile_positions.title: Test Analyst
